select x.kucun_id,k.shuliang kucun_shuliang,x.kuanhao_id,x.yanse,x.chima,sum(x.shuliang) xiaoshou_shuliang,k.jinjia,k.chengbenjia,x.shoujia, sum(x.shuliang*k.chengbenjia) zongchengben,sum(x.shuliang*x.shoujia) zongjia,sum(x.shijishoukuan) shijishoukuan, sum(shijishoukuan-x.shuliang*k.chengbenjia) lirun from xiaoshou_table x,kucun_table k where x.kucun_id=k.kucun_id and x.zhuangtai=1 and x.delflg=0
and x.maijia_id like '%${kehu_id}%'
and x.maijiaxingming like '%${kehuname}%'
and x.kucun_id like '%${kucun_id}%'
and x.kuanhao_id like '%${kuanhao_id}%'
and x.yanse like '%${yanse}%'
and x.chima like '%${chima}%'
and x.xiaoshou_id>#{startdate}
and x.xiaoshou_id<#{enddate}
group by x.kuanhao_id,x.yanse,x.chima

select xiaoshou_id, product_id, kucun_id, kuanhao_id, yanse, chima, shuliang, shoujia, shijishoukuan, maijia_id, maijiaxingming, zhuangtai, delflg, beizhu, post_type, col1, col2, col3 from xiaoshou_table where xiaoshou_id = #{xiaoshou_id}
mapper.insert: insert into xiaoshou_table ( xiaoshou_id, product_id, kucun_id, kuanhao_id, yanse, chima, shuliang, shoujia, shijishoukuan, maijia_id, maijiaxingming, zhuangtai, delflg, beizhu, post_type, col1, col2, col3 ) values ( #{xiaoshou_id}, #{product_id}, #{kucun_id}, #{kuanhao_id}, #{yanse}, #{chima}, #{shuliang}, #{shoujia}, #{shijishoukuan}, #{maijia_id}, #{maijiaxingming}, #{zhuangtai}, #{delflg}, #{beizhu}, #{post_type}, #{col1}, #{col2}, #{col3} )
mapper.update: update xiaoshou_table set zhuangtai = '1' where xiaoshou_id = #{xiaoshou_id}
